citation: Proclamation under the Stadiums Tasmania Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Stadiums Tasmania Act 2022

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Stadiums Tasmania Act 2022 fix 25 May 2022 as the day on which that Act commences.

18 May 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Aboriginal Affairs, acting for and on behalf of the Minister for State Development, Construction and Housing

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 May 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
